attributes.action: stop the tax on our cars as we pay two much tax on petrol and tax on car parts,food ect..an mot should be enough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the 6 months and 12 months tax disc as we are paying more than enough on petrol,car parts, food, and almost everything els,a 12 month mot should be quite enough,

rejection.details:
There are already petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=car+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
